text: Kezban is a 1953 Turkish romance film directed by Hicri Akbasli and starring Bülent Oran, Gönül Bayhan and Muzaffer Nebioglu. ==Cast== * Bülent Oran * Gönül Bayhan * Muzaffer Nebioglu * Muhterem Nur * Cahit Irgat * Ayten Çakar ==External links== * Category:1953 films Category:1950s romance films Category:Turkish-language films Category:Turkish films Category:Turkish romance films
title: Kezban
